defaultPrompt: Create a wedding website that allows guests to RSVP, view event details, access a gift registry, and see a photo gallery.
description: Build custom wedding and event websites with seamless RSVP, gift registry, and guest management features.

hero.subtitle: Create personalized wedding and event websites with robust features, all on your own terms.
hero.title: Custom Wedding & Event Websites

metaDescription: Design and deploy bespoke wedding and event websites with Kliv. Empower your event planning with integrated RSVP, gift registry, guest communication, and stunning design.

sections.title: The Need for Personalized Event Websites
sections.content:
In today's digitally connected world, a well-designed website is essential for any significant event, especially weddings. Generic, off-the-shelf templates often fall short of capturing the unique essence of a couple or an event, leading to scattered information, frustrating guest experiences, and limited branding.

Kliv empowers you to build a tailor-made digital hub that reflects your vision perfectly, offers smooth interactions for guests, and streamlines your planning process through truly custom features.

sections.title: Why Build Your Own Event Website?
sections.content:
Building your own wedding or event website might seem daunting, but platforms like Kliv make it accessible and highly rewarding. Forget the limitations of pre-packaged solutions and embrace the freedom of a custom build.

## Limitations of Existing Solutions

- **Lack of true personalization:** Most platforms offer limited design flexibility, making every site look similar.
- **Feature gaps:** You often find yourself needing a specific integration or function that isn‚Äôt available.
- **Hidden fees and upsells:** Basic features might be free, but comprehensive guest management or custom domains come at a recurring cost.
- **Data privacy concerns:** Your guest list and personal details might be exposed to third-party services.
- **Generic user experience:** The flow and capabilities are designed for the masses, not your unique event.

## The Advantages of a Bespoke Platform

1.  **Unmatched Personalization:** Design every element to match your theme, colors, and personality. From custom fonts to unique page layouts, your site will truly be one-of-a-kind.
    *Example: A couple can integrate interactive maps for multiple event locations, complete with personalized travel tips for out-of-town guests.*

2.  **Tailored Features & Integrations:** Build exactly the functionality you need. Want a specific RSVP question? Need to integrate with a less common gift registry? Kliv allows you to create or connect any feature.
    *Example: Integrate a live countdown timer that updates based on timezones, or connect directly to a unique custom gift experience service.*

3.  **Cost Efficiency & Ownership:** Unlike recurring subscriptions, building with Kliv is a one-time investment in your own custom software. You own the codebase, giving you complete control and eliminating ongoing fees.
    *Example: Instead of paying monthly for guest communication features, you build them once and they're yours forever.*

4.  **Enhanced Guest Experience:** Provide a seamless, intuitive, and beautiful experience for your guests. From digital invitations to easy RSVP forms, every interaction can be optimized.
    *Example: Guests can RSVP for specific events within a multi-day celebration, and receive personalized agendas based on their responses.*

5.  **Centralized Information Hub:** Consolidate all event details‚Äîitinerary, accommodations, dress code, FAQs, photo galleries‚Äîin one accessible place, reducing endless questions.
    *Example: A single page can dynamically display FAQs, pulling answers from an easily updated database.*

6.  **Secure & Private Data:** Host your site where you choose, ensuring your sensitive guest data remains private and secure, free from third-party advertising or analysis.
    *Example: Collect dietary restrictions with confidence, knowing the data is controlled by you.*

## AI-Powered Development for Event Planners

Kliv leverages AI to simplify complex development tasks. You don't need to be a programmer to build a sophisticated event website. Describe your vision, and AI assists in generating the code, setting up databases, and even deploying your site. This means:

-   **Rapid Prototyping:** See your ideas take shape in hours, not weeks.
-   **Intuitive Customization:** Modify designs and features with natural language prompts.
-   **Scalability:** Easily add new features or expand capabilities as your event planning needs evolve.

Empower yourself to create an event website that is as unique and special as your occasion.

sections.title: Event Website Ideas to Inspire You

items.description: Create a comprehensive site for guests to respond, select meals, and ask questions.
items.prompt: Build a wedding website with detailed event schedule, multi-guest RSVP form including meal choices and dietary restrictions, a contact form, and a gift registry section with links to external sites.
items.title: Interactive Wedding RSVP Hub

items.description: Showcase family stories, photos, and reunion details with a personalized touch.
items.prompt: Develop a family reunion website featuring a photo gallery, a timeline of family history, an RSVP for attendees, and accommodation suggestions for out-of-town relatives.
items.title: Family Reunion Portal

items.description: Manage ticket sales, speaker bios, and session registration for a conference.
items.prompt: Design a conference website with speaker profiles, a dynamic event agenda, ticket purchase integration via Stripe, and a separate registration for breakout sessions.
items.title: Professional Conference Platform

items.description: A festive site to gather RSVPs and share details for holiday gatherings.
items.prompt: Create a holiday party invitation website including an RSVP form for headcounts, a custom map to the venue, a dedicated page for party themes/dress code, and a potluck sign-up sheet.
items.title: Holiday Party Organizer

items.description: Automate guest responses and information sharing for milestone birthdays.
items.prompt: Build a birthday celebration website with event details, a simple RSVP, a 'wish list' section, and a guestbook where friends can leave messages.
items.title: Milestone Birthday Page

items.prompt: Add a dynamic photo gallery that allows guests to upload their own photos from the event.
items.title: Guest Photo Upload Integration

items.prompt: Implement a real-time chat functionality on the website for guests to communicate with each other.
items.title: Live Guest Chat

items.prompt: Create a personalized QR code for each guest invitation that pre-fills their RSVP form when scanned.
items.title: Personalized QR Code RSVP

items.prompt: Add a feature for sending automated email reminders to guests who haven't RSVP'd by a certain date.
items.title: Automated RSVP Reminders

items.prompt: Build an admin dashboard where event hosts can view RSVP responses, guest lists, and send bulk updates.
items.title: Host Admin Dashboard

items.prompt: Integrate a weather widget that displays the forecast for the event location on the day of the event.
items.title: Event Day Weather Widget

items.prompt: Implement a custom song request feature where guests can submit songs for the DJ or band.
items.title: Guest Song Request Form

items.prompt: Add a multi-language option for the entire website to cater to international guests.
items.title: Multi-Language Support

items.description: Collect guest responses quickly and accurately with customizable forms.
items.title: Custom RSVP Forms

items.description: Share itineraries, locations, and important timings clearly.
items.title: Dynamic Event Schedules

items.description: Securely manage guest data, dietary needs, and seating arrangements.
items.title: Integrated Guest Management

items.description: Link to registries and provide gift-giving information seamlessly.
items.title: Gift Registry Integration

items.description: Display beautiful photo and video content from your event.
items.title: Media Galleries

items.description: Keep guests informed with updates and important announcements.
items.title: Communication Tools

items.answer: Kliv's platform significantly reduces development time. A basic, functional event website with core features can be built in a matter of hours, while more complex sites with advanced integrations might take a few days of focused effort.
items.question: How quickly can I build an event website with Kliv?

items.answer: No coding experience is necessary. Kliv uses AI and intuitive interfaces that allow you to describe your desired features and design elements in plain language, and the platform translates that into a functioning application.
items.question: Do I need to be a developer to use Kliv for this?

items.answer: Yes, your event website can securely handle guest data, including names, contact information, meal preferences, and more. You have full control over how data is collected, stored, and managed, ensuring compliance with privacy standards.
items.question: Can the website handle sensitive guest data securely?

items.answer: Absolutely. Your custom website can integrate with almost any external service that offers an API, including popular gift registries, payment gateways (like Stripe or PayPal), email marketing tools, and mapping services.
items.question: Can I integrate my custom event website with other tools?

items.answer: You can host your custom-built website wherever you prefer, whether on a private server, cloud hosting provider, or a traditional web host. Kliv provides the code and structure, giving you full portability.
items.question: Where will my custom event website be hosted?

items.answer: While Kliv offers powerful AI assistance during development, you are always in control. You can fully customize and modify the code, add new features, or change the design at any point post-launch, ensuring your website evolves with your needs.
items.question: What if I need to make changes to the website after it's live?

items.answer: A custom-built website provides a one-time investment solution. Compared to recurring subscription fees for template-based services, a Kliv-built site often becomes more cost-effective within a year, especially for professional event planners or multi-event use.
items.question: How does the cost compare to off-the-shelf event website builders?

sections.title: Ready to Design Your Perfect Event Website?
sections.content: Stop limiting your vision with generic templates. Bring your unique event to life with a bespoke website, built precisely to your specifications and ready to make a lasting impression.

title: Wedding & Event Websites
